radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderate steatosis, without gallbladder and bile duct abnormalities.

radiographic_examinations.date: 6 weeks after discontinuation of IVGC and 1 week after stopping rosuvastatin and lysine acetylsalicylate
radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderate lymphocytic portal and lobular inflammation, with scattered plasma cells and eosinophils, focal interface and bridging necrosis, and diffuse centrilobular necrosis.
